name: wolfslice
text: Teodor looks like he's getting hit with a gust of wind.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: A gust of wince was my take. He's throwing up a bit in his mouth too.

name: biiaru
text: Actually looking at the strip, it looks like the only way that would be possible is if Ray farted out his nipples.

name: manxome
text: ...why?

name: deimosrising
text: Or a gust of unimaginably inappropriate. Either way, hilarious.

name: centipede_damascus
text: All of us sometimes need to make that call to apologize for things we have said.

name: abe
text: I'm sorry I stoned your sister-in-law.

name: littlefatdog
text: A comment left by littlefatdog was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, rpm10000, dretienne, morbo)

name: farqussus
text: YOU ARE A FAT LITTLE DOG

name: zaratustra
text: First time I read this I read it as 'Hey man, it's Ray. I'm sorry that I boned your brother-in-law.' Teodor's wince made much more sense.

name: dj
text: Ahahahhaaha, thanks, now I'm gonna go right on ahead and pretend it does say that.

name: philosophe
text: Hey, I think I thought that too...

name: chrissketch
text: I as well.

name: lizjones
text: Straight and to the point.

name: rothenbergxxx
text: I think Pat was especially pissed off because of his insecurities regarding homosexuality.

name: odei
text: I think Onstad hadn't even thought of that arc yet.

name: deusoma
text: Yeah, I think they implied the curse just magically made him gay one day, no prior effort on his part.

name: zapatos
text: Gay Love is fairly magical.  I suppose.

name: tekende
text: They ain't called fairies for nothing!

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Pat didn't like what Ray said. Ray was bent on Ketel One. Now he has to apologize."

name: lordhumungus
text:
I think this strip goes back in time and makes the previous one even funnier, while being a brilliant laugh on its own terms.

I really feel Ray on this. I often make statements so off-color that they warrant the next-day apology to avoid it becoming a thing.

name: garlic_breath
text: A comment left by garlic_breath was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, nighttoad, daidai, Thorfinn, puadxe, DavemanDeluxe, NeoNaoNeo, re5urgam, Stonecrab, speedwell, mystkmanat, NotCool, morbo)

name: mystkmanat
text: You sound like kind of a dick.

name: plezure
text: This was before or after Pat became gay?

name: honesttom
text: Before. I'm just curious about this sister. Is she an asshole too?

name: tekende
text: No, she's a cunt.

name: wae
text: in reality, he's not sorry at all.

name: brzbee
text: always with the ketel one...

name: rowboat
text: And to think that Pat was heretofore considered to be one of the dirtiest dudes in town. For shame.

name: thatcher
text: When I sqeeze a Martini glass by the stem it usually shatters. Teodor knows this too, and puts all the effort into closing his eyes harder instead.

name: luckypyjamas
text: i think $600 would be a good apology

name: wiliamthepleasr
text: I mean, it's an apology, but it's no six hundo apology.

name: baryonyx
text: This seems more like the Pat we know and hate in the present day. Is this the earliest instance of his ultimate personality?

name: rbisme
text: I think pat boned the brother in law and got all kinds of jealous.

name: jhunter
text: it's the call nobody wants to make.

name: miaou
text: Gosh is Ray's stance gross... I like how the only body part that moves throughout the strip is his right arm. Transition from panel 3 to panel 4 is particularly hilarious...

name: milo
text: teodor's expression, it's like Ray's bad apologising skills are creating a shockwave...
